Who this book is for
Tactical Trend Trading is a guide to the fast-paced world of trend trading for those with some experience actively trading or investing in the financial markets but who lack the specific technical knowledge or psychological framework that is crucial to trend trading success. Specifically, this book will appeal to investors who are tired of seeing their portfolios decimated by every major move the market makes and want to understandÃ¢â‚¬â€and profit fromÃ¢â‚¬â€the rapid rate of change and turmoil underlying their assets.
